sentences.en: In March 1889, she became the first British sovereign to set foot on Spanish soil.
sentences.cn: 1889年3月，她成为首位踏上西班牙国土的英国君主。

sentences.en: It is essentially an exercise of sovereign power.
sentences.cn: 这种行为属于对国王的效忠行为.

sentences.en: King George was the sovereign of England.
King George was then the sovereign of England.
sentences.cn: 乔治国王那时是英国的君主.

sentences.en: Lithuania and Armenia signed a treaty in Vilnius recognizing each other as independent sovereign states.
sentences.cn: 立陶宛和亚美尼亚在维尔纽斯签订了一份互相承认各自为独立主权国家的协定。

sentences.en: Optimize sovereign applications for full - screen use.
sentences.cn: 全屏幕使用独占应用,让它发挥最优效果.

sentences.en: Rightly constituted laws, said Aristotle, should be the final sovereign.
sentences.cn: 亚里士多德说, 正确制定的法律应该是最高的权威.

sentences.en: Self - vevence, self - knowledge, self - control , these three alone lead life to sovereign power.
sentences.cn: 自重, 自觉, 自制, 此三者可以将生命引至崇高境域.

sentences.en: Sovereign power will continue to lie with the Supreme People's Assembly.
sentences.cn: 最高统治权仍然掌握在最高人民会议手中。

sentences.en: The Admiralty court was declared by statute to be a sovereign court.
sentences.cn: 法律规定海事法庭是最高管辖法庭.

sentences.en: The people expected great things from their new sovereign.
sentences.cn: 人们期望着新国王的非凡作为.

sentences.en: The sovereign goes throughout the British Isles.
These laws should be sovereign on every issue.
sentences.cn: 这些法律应该对每个问题都具有最高权威的.

sentences.en: This is the only and sovereign agent.
sentences.cn: 这是唯一的,至高无上的起因.

sentences.en: What effect had this sovereign development produced upon the invasion problem?
sentences.cn: 这一极其重要的新事物在入侵问题上产生了什么影响 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 主权；主权国家；君主；独立国
君主；独立国；最高统治者

trans.tran_cn: 独立自主的，拥有最高统治权的，至高无上的，极好的
trans.tran_en: having the highest power in a country

trans.tran_cn: 君主，最高统治者，独立国，旧时价值为一镑的英国金币
